3 qubit, add, starting at state 111 followed by Hadamards on each qubit.Then the single pulse is applied on each qubit(parallel) with different Bs and different data-data couplings. 

ancilla-data coupling = B/(2pi MHz), data-data coupling=d-d_fac*B

gamma=1/(540 μs), Ω=17*2π MHz, Δ_initial=-0.5Ω, δt_inital=0.2μs.

The fidelities are results by optimizing Δ, δt, and single-qubit rotation phases φ1 ,φ2 and φ3.

The fidelities are calculated with the density matrix from the simulation, and the density matrix from putting the inital states through standard CCZ and CZZ(or two sequential CZ) gates.

CCZ=diag(1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1}; CZZ=diag{1,-1,-1,1,1,1,1,1}

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Format for each line:

Target|d-d_fac|B|φ1|φ2|φ3|Fidelity|Δ/Ω|δt(μs)

czz 0 60.0 1.0808171494141714 -2.0606879236244606 -2.0606825951979584 0.9999421950097868 -1.420453801157399 0.2381815719678498 

czz 0 600.0 -2.089067396918333 0.8867940245275644 0.8869098722365724 0.987822324439699 -0.8190216294591934 0.43641876150228365 

czz 0 2000.0 -2.3237371453729714 0.6518872328520341 0.6518385253559046 0.9878044055724768 -0.799734140515728 0.4358767504953851 

ccz 0 60.0 1.7241016735473147 -3.823444470823154 2.45965589889594 0.8530197683448791 -1.374318269067114 0.3804703488457032 

ccz 0 600.0 -2.024794922980112 3.409836160970149 -2.8731805781445634 0.8520219126954626 -1.2025264661798019 0.42602268447042835 

ccz 0 2000.0 -0.9815964124547992 -1.8324571822694322 -1.832513197875334 0.8516653181655897 -1.0522825406467142 0.3448358002955093 

ccz 1 60.0 4.0427053280057335 -2.2403007117143257 -2.2404300643878825 0.9832335724009571 -0.45434751909342147 0.10716927985425521 

ccz 1 600.0 2.4466104865354685 2.446679878242544 2.4463676513003567 0.9813740098576448 -0.3983617912399132 0.12879691920151748 

ccz 1 2000.0 2.3532035425516495 2.3532963897674657 2.353324144119117 0.9811636314141675 -0.39193136193612454 0.12947997475599554 

czz 1 60.0 -3.1700465398670516 1.5451211983240773 1.544947718376252 0.8087976429615521 -0.28584245408823117 0.24345764079142124 

czz 1 600.0 -1.1318332709050325 3.4527557320512177 3.4530453640630467 0.8014610110281436 -0.9916948367984688 0.4379844442283438
